mapper.sql: SELECT REV_NO /* prGoodsRevReplyInfo.reviewReplyListBase */ , REPLY_SEQ , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR037',WRTMN_GB_CD ) AS WRTMN_GB_CD_NM , WRTMN_ID , REPLY_CONT , REPLY_SEQ_DISP_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR022',REPLY_SEQ_DISP_STAT_CD ) AS REPLY_SEQ_DISP_STAT_CD_NM , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_GOODS_REV_REPLY_INFO WHERE REV_NO = #{revNo} ORDER BY SYS_REG_DTM DESC
